name: file-tree-to-text-generator
description: Print the selected directory within it's files and subdirectories as text (multiple formats available)

tree-generator.defaultDepth.description: Default max depth of the generated tree

tree-generator.defaultTarget.description: Set your default output format. It is just respected if prompt is disabled.

tree-generator.prompt.description: Choose if the user will be promt or if the default settings will  be applied

tree-generator.targets.description: Configure the output targets and adjust the configuration for tree items

picker.title: Configure the prompt for the user

label.title: Prompt label for the target format
label.description: The short label for the target format

description.title: Prompt description for the target format
description.description: A description for the target format that will be displayed to the user

beforeTree.title: Text before the tree
beforeTree.description: Define a text (HTML) which will be added before the tree items

afterTree.title: Text after the tree
afterTree.description: Define a text (HTML) which will be added after the tree items

indent.title: Indentation
indent.description: Set a string for indent per level of the tree

masks.title: Configure the masks for tree items

root.title: The mask for the first (root) item
root.description:
Use the placeholders #0, #1 amd #2 which will be replaces as with the following content:
 #0 : Insert the tree level number
 #1 : Insert the name of the file or directory
 #2 : Insert the relative path to the file or directory starting from the selected directory
 Example: '#0: [#1](.#2)' becomes '1: [file1.txt](./path/to/file/file1.txt)'
